info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 20 at 3:16PM EDT until July 20 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS Detroit
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN WAYNE AND MACOMB COUNTIES... At 316 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located over Detroit Zoo, or near Warren, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Ping pong ball size hail and 60 mph wind gusts. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...People and animals outdoors will be injured. Expect hail damage to roofs, siding, windows, and vehicles. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. This severe storm will be near... Warren around 330 PM EDT. Sterling Heights and Clinton around 345 PM EDT. St. Clair Shores around 350 PM EDT. Mount Clemens and Macomb Township around 355 PM EDT. New Baltimore around 415 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this severe thunderstorm include Roseville, Shelby Township, Ray Center, Utica, Washington, Harper Woods, Grosse Pointe Shores, Center Line, Grosse Pointe Woods and Chesterfield Township. People attending Fraser Lions Club Carnival , and Jimmy Johns Field should seek safe shelter immediately! HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.50 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
